title: Sparks (A Rural Paranormal Fantasy): Book One of the Stella Westfall Series
description: Stella Westfall is grieving her mother’s unexplained death when a motorcycle accident sparks a latent magical ability -- the power to manipulate energy. With her new-found powers comes an invitation to join a secret coven of local witches, including unnervingly handsome and narcissistic Charles and earthy, grounded Derek. As she navigates the magical underground of witches, shapeshifters and her own Pennsylvania Dutch heritage, she uncovers something terrifyingly sinister. Could this truth be somehow linked to her mother’s untimely demise?
author: Andrea Kresge
